AVSEC ORDER 5 / 2000 
 
 
SUB : DUMMY CHECK – AUTHORISATION 
 
 
In continuation of this Bureau AVSEC Order. NO 1/1999 dated 27.08.1999, the 
BCAS officers of the rank of Asst. Commissioner and above are authorized to conduct 
dummy checks at any point of time without specifying any time / to test the professional 
efficiency and alertness of APS staff and other agencies at Airports as it is one of the 
charter of duties of BCAS Officers.  
 
 
Any other of the rank mentioned above of Bureau of Civil Aviation Security is 
authorized to conduct dummy checks with or without the help of passengers, visitors, 
employees working at the airport after taking him/her/ them into confidence while 
conducting Inspection / Visit / Training at airport. 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 (R.K.SINGH) 
ADDL.COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CA) 
 
REF.NO. CAS-6(4)/99-DIV-I, Dated : 10.09.2000
